00110             function                save_uploaded_file( $SavePath , $FileName , $OriginalFileName )
00111             {
00112                   try
00113                   {
00114                         $FileInputAccess = get_package( 'file_input::file_input_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00115                         
00116                         $Record = array( 'file_path' => $SavePath.$FileName , 'original_file_name' => $OriginalFileName );
00117                         $id = $FileInputAccess->create( $Record );
00118                         
00119                         $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00120                         $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_load_file' , array( 'id' => $id ) );
00121                         
00122                         $Record[ 'id' ] = $id;
00123                         $FileInputAlgorithms = get_package( 'file_input::file_input_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00124                         $this->UploadedFile = $Record;
00125                         
00126                         return( $id );
00127                   }
00128                   catch( Exception $e )
00129                   {
00130                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00131                   }
00132             }

00160             function                display_file_info( $SavePath , $FileId , $OriginalFileName )
00161             {
00162                   try
00163                   {
00164                         $ServerData = new stdClass;
00165                         set_field( $ServerData , 'href' , $SavePath );
00166                         set_field( $ServerData , 'id' , $FileId );

00168                         
00169                         $JSON = get_package( 'json' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00170                         print_r( $JSON->encode( $ServerData ) );
00171                   }

00174                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00200             function                process_request( &$Options )
00201             {
00202                   try
00203                   {
00204                         global      $extension_whitelist;
00205                         $extension_whitelist = $this->FileInputAlgorithms->get_extensions( 
00206                               $Options->get_setting( 'file_types' , 'default' )
00207                         );
00208 
00209                         $PackagePath = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 'file_input::file_input_controller' , '1.0.0' );
00210                         $DirectoryPath = $PackagePath.'/data/'.date( 'Ymd' );
00211                         @mkdir_ex( $DirectoryPath );
00212 
00213                         global      $save_path;
00214                         $save_path = $DirectoryPath.'/';
00215                         global      $file_name;
00216                         global      $original_file_name;
00217                         define( 'NO_DIRECT_CALL' , 1 );
00218                         require_once( $PackagePath.'/include/php/upload.php' );
00219                         
00220                         return( array( $save_path , $file_name , $original_file_name ) );
00221                   }
00222                   catch( Exception $e )
00223                   {
00224                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00225                   }

00246             function                upload_file( &$Options )
00247             {
00248                   try
00249                   {
00250                         list( $save_path , $file_name , $original_file_name ) = $this->process_request( $Options );
00251                         
00252                         $id = $this->save_uploaded_file( $save_path , $file_name , $original_file_name );
00253                         
00254                         $VarName = $this->Security->get_gp( 'page_name' , 'command' ).'_file';
00255                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'var_name' , false ) !== false )
00256                         {
00257                               $VarName = $Options->get_setting( 'var_name' );
00258                         }
00259                         /* saving info in the session */
00260                         $this->Security->set_s( $VarName , $id );
00261                         
00262                         $this->display_file_info( $save_path."$file_name" , $id , $original_file_name );
00263                   }
00264                   catch( Exception $e )
00265                   {
00266                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00267                   }
00268             }

00288             function                controller( $Options )
00289             {
00290                   try
00291                   {
00292                         $UploadFile = $Options->get_setting( 'upload_file' , false );
00293                         $NotDirectController = $this->Security->get_s( 'direct_controller' , 'integer' , 0 ) == 0;
00294 
00295                         if( $UploadFile && $NotDirectController )
00296                         {
00297                               $this->upload_file( $Options );
00298                         }
00299                   }
00300                   catch( Exception $e )
00301                   {
00302                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
